p: The dried G. lucidum was obtained from a local pharmacy (Kang-Bai-Jia Medical Chain Store, Fujian, China). 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH), ursolic acid, ferric chloride, and trichloroacetic acid were products of Sigma-Aldrich Co. (St. Louis, MO, USA). All other chemical reagents used were of analytical grade.
